title: Battling the Insurgency with Social Science

content: "Social Science" Laugh...Look. Why don't people understand that all of these people have been living, fighting and killing for thousands and thousands of years longer than we have even been a nation. Us/We/They are not going to change them with a concept like "Social Science". The only ones that can change them are themselves. The ONLY reason I support Afghanistan is to find and kill OBL. Other than that, let them live, die/kill each other and pray the way they want. Get OBL and get out. Let them rule the rocks.

It's just as ridiculus as people thinking they can talk a terror group out of attacking us. Todays politics remind me of an old saying. - "Ideas are more powerful than guns. We would not let our enemies have guns, why should we let them have ideas?" - Joseph Stalin
